Lift the standard. The minister of the gospel must not give all his attention to sermonizing. The church of God must be kept in order. There is ministering to be done. The sick are to be visited. Men and women are to be educated after the divine model. "It is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed. The night is 


                                    -298- 

far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armor of light" [Romans 13:12].
